Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Itara Apartments in Thuringowa Central, you'll be in a shopping district and minutes from Riverway Lagoon and Tony Ireland Stadium. This 4.5-star apartment is convenient to Willows Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 52 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, a picnic area, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Itara Apartments.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift). Event facilities at this apartment consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Itara Apartments.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Itara Apartments in Thuringowa Central, you'll be in a shopping district and minutes from Riverway Lagoon and Tony Ireland Stadium. This 4.5-star apartment is convenient to Willows Shopping Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Riverway Lagoon - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Tony Ireland Stadium - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Willows Shopping Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Cluden Racecourse - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Castle Hill - 10.5 km / 6.6 mi
ReefHQ Aquarium - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Magnetic Island Ferry Terminal - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Billabong Sanctuary - 19.3 km / 12 mi
Magnetic Island National Park - 24 km / 14.9 mi
Horseshoe Bay Beach - 26.5 km / 16.5 mi
Burdekin Theatre - 76.3 km / 47.4 mi
Ayr Golf Course - 77.2 km / 48 mi
Yank's Jetty - 78.7 km / 48.9 mi
Cattle Bay - 82.6 km / 51.4 mi
Little Pioneer Bay - 84.8 km / 52.7 mi

The preferred airport for Itara Apartments is Townsville, QLD (TSV) - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
